info.title: Consolidated Screening List API
info.description: The Consolidated Screening List API consolidates eleven export screening lists of the Departments of Commerce, State and the Treasury into a single data feed as an aid to industry in conducting electronic screens of potential parties to regulated transactions.

get.description: The Consolidated Screening List API consolidates eleven export screening lists of the Departments of Commerce, State and the Treasury into a single data feed as an aid to industry in conducting electronic screens of potential parties to regulated transactions.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the name, alt_names, remarks, and title fields from all eleven lists.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Searches only the lists specified by the Source Abbreviation.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Searches only entities whose country, nationalities, or citizenships fields match the country code based on ISO alpha-2 country codes. The country fields are found in the addresses and ids arrays. This method allows you to search for multiple countries (plural) separated by commas but will only return one country (singular) per entity.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Searches against fields in the addresses array.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Searches against the name and alt_names fields.

parameters.name: fuzzy_name
parameters.description: Set fuzzy_name=true to utilize fuzzy name matching.  Fuzzy name matching enables users to query a name and get usable results without knowing the exact spelling of an entry.  The fuzzy_name parameter only works in tandem with name.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Searches based on the type of the entry (e.g, Individual, Entity, Vessel).

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Returns entries based on their start date. Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd. Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Returns entries based on their end date. Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd. Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: issue_date
parameters.description: Returns entries based on the issue dates of the ids array. Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd. Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: expiration_date
parameters.description: Returns entries based on the expiration dates of the ids array. Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd. Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort parameter returns entries sorted on the given field.  Possible fields are name, start_date, issue_date, end_date, and expiration date.  Enter the field name followed by a colon, then asc (ascending) or desc (descending).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

alt_names.description: Alias names used by the entity.

source_information_url.description: Information from the Source agency about the list.

ids.description: An array showing specific identification information of the entity.

entity_number.description: Unique id assigned by the originating list.

start_date.description: The effective date for the entity to be included on the list as defined by the Federal Register Notice.

end_date.description: The date on which the entity's inclusion on the list will be lifted, waived, or will have expired.

federal_register_notice.description: The official source of information about the parties on this list.

license_requirement.description: The license requirement as determined by the Export Administration Regulations.

license_policy.description: The policy set forth in the Export Administration Regulations regarding denial.

remarks.description: Additional remarks or notes regarding the company, entity, or person on the list.

standard_order.description: Whether or not (Y/N) the standard order applies to the Denied Party as defined by the Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS).

programs.description: Agency programs related to the entity on the list.

source.description: The name of the source list where this entity is listed.

gross_registered_tonnage.description: The gross weight in tons registered for the vessel.

gross_tonnage.description: The gross weight in tons not-registered for the vessel.

vessel_type.description: Describes the type of vessel (ferry, bulk cargo, tug).
